verses.verse: <S%H5756>"Flee<s%> for <S%H1121>safety,<s%> you children of <S%H1144>Benjamin,<s%> out of the <S%H7130>midst<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> and <S%H8628>blow<s%> the <S%H7782>trumpet<s%> in <S%H8620>Tekoa,<s%> and raise <S%H5375>up<s%> a <S%H4864>signal<s%> on Beth <S%H1021>Haccherem;<s%> for <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H8259>looks<s%> forth from the <S%H6828>north,<s%> and a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H7667>destruction.<s%>
<S%H1820>The<s%> <S%H5116>comely<s%> and <S%H6026>delicate<s%> <S%H1323>one,<s%> the daughter of <S%H6726>Zion,<s%> will I cut off.

<S%H7462>Shepherds<s%> with their <S%H5739>flocks<s%> shall <S%H935>come<s%> to <S%H8628>her;<s%> they shall pitch their <S%H168>tents<s%> against her all <S%H5439>around;<s%> they shall <S%H7462>feed<s%> <S%H376>everyone<s%> in his <S%H3027>place.<s%>"

<S%H6942>"Prepare<s%> <S%H4421>war<s%> against <S%H6965>her;<s%> arise, and let us go <S%H5927>up<s%> at <S%H6672>noon.<s%> <S%H188>Woe<s%> to <S%H3117>us!<s%> For the day <S%H6437>declines,<s%> for the <S%H6752>shadows<s%> of the <S%H6153>evening<s%> are stretched <S%H5186>out.<s%>
<S%H6965>Arise,<s%> and let us <S%H5927>go<s%> up by <S%H3915>night,<s%> and let us <S%H7843>destroy<s%> her <S%H759>palaces.<s%>"

For <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> of <S%H6635>Armies<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> "Cut <S%H3772>down<s%> <S%H6097>trees,<s%> and <S%H8210>cast<s%> up a <S%H5550>mound<s%> against <S%H3389>Jerusalem:<s%> this is the <S%H5892>city<s%> to be <S%H6485>visited;<s%> she is wholly <S%H6233>oppression<s%> in the midst of <S%H7130>her.<s%>

As a <S%H953>well<s%> casts <S%H6979>forth<s%> its <S%H4325>waters,<s%> so she casts <S%H6979>forth<s%> her <S%H7451>wickedness:<s%> <S%H2555>violence<s%> and <S%H7701>destruction<s%> is <S%H8085>heard<s%> in <S%H6440>her;<s%> before me <S%H8548>continually<s%> is <S%H2483>sickness<s%> and <S%H4347>wounds.<s%>

Be <S%H3256>instructed,<s%> <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> lest my <S%H5315>soul<s%> be <S%H3363>alienated<s%> from <S%H7760>you;<s%> lest I make you a <S%H8077>desolation,<s%> a <S%H776>land<s%> not <S%H3427>inhabited.<s%>"

Thus <S%H559>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> of <S%H6635>Armies,<s%> "They shall <S%H5953>thoroughly<s%> <S%H5953>glean<s%> the <S%H7611>remnant<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> like a <S%H1612>vine.<s%> Turn <S%H7725>again<s%> your <S%H3027>hand<s%> as a grape <S%H1219>gatherer<s%> into the <S%H5552>baskets.<s%>"

To whom shall I <S%H1696>speak<s%> and <S%H1696>testify,<s%> that they may <S%H8085>hear?<s%> <S%H241>Behold,<s%> their ear is <S%H6189>uncircumcised,<s%> and they <S%H3201>can't<s%> <S%H7181>listen.<s%> <S%H1697>Behold,<s%> the word of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> has become a <S%H2781>reproach<s%> to <S%H2654>them.<s%> They have no delight in it.

Therefore I am <S%H4392>full<s%> of the <S%H2534>wrath<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%> I am <S%H3811>weary<s%> with holding <S%H3557>in.<s%> "Pour it <S%H8210>out<s%> on the <S%H5768>children<s%> in the <S%H2351>street,<s%> and on the <S%H5475>assembly<s%> of young <S%H970>men<s%> <S%H3162>together;<s%> for even the <S%H376>husband<s%> with the <S%H802>wife<s%> shall be <S%H3920>taken,<s%> the <S%H2205>aged<s%> with him who is <S%H4390>full<s%> of <S%H3117>days.<s%>

Their <S%H1004>houses<s%> shall be <S%H5437>turned<s%> to <S%H312>others,<s%> their <S%H7704>fields<s%> and their <S%H802>wives<s%> <S%H3162>together;<s%> for I will stretch <S%H5186>out<s%> my <S%H3027>hand<s%> on the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of the <S%H776>land,<s%> <S%H5002>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>"

"For from their <S%H6996>least<s%> even to their <S%H1419>greatest,<s%> everyone is <S%H1214>given<s%> to <S%H1215>covetousness;<s%> and from the <S%H5030>prophet<s%> even to the <S%H3548>priest,<s%> everyone <S%H6213>deals<s%> <S%H8267>falsely.<s%>

They have <S%H7495>healed<s%> also the <S%H7667>hurt<s%> of <S%H1323>my<s%> <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H7043>superficially,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H7965><s%> 'Peace, <S%H7965>peace!<s%>' when there is no <S%H7965>peace.<s%>

Were they <S%H3001>ashamed<s%> when they had <S%H6213>committed<s%> <S%H8441>abomination?<s%> <S%H1571>No,<s%> they were not at <S%H954>all<s%> <S%H954>ashamed,<s%> <S%H1571>neither<s%> <S%H3045>could<s%> they <S%H3637>blush.<s%> Therefore they shall <S%H5307>fall<s%> among those who <S%H5307>fall;<s%> at the <S%H6256>time<s%> that I <S%H6485>visit<s%> <S%H3782>them,<s%> they shall be cast down," <S%H559>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>

Thus <S%H559>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> <S%H5975>"Stand<s%> in the <S%H1870>ways<s%> and <S%H7200>see,<s%> and <S%H7592>ask<s%> for the <S%H5769>old<s%> <S%H5410>paths,<s%> <S%H2896><s%> 'Where is the good <S%H1870>way?<s%>' and <S%H3212>walk<s%> in <S%H4672>it,<s%> and you will find <S%H4771>rest<s%> for your <S%H5315>souls.<s%> But they <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H3212><s%> 'We will not walk in it.'
I <S%H6965>set<s%> <S%H6822>watchmen<s%> over <S%H7181>you,<s%> saying, 'Listen to the <S%H6963>sound<s%> of the <S%H7782>trumpet!<s%>' But they <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H7181><s%> 'We will not listen!'
Therefore <S%H8085>hear,<s%> you <S%H1471>nations,<s%> and <S%H3045>know,<s%> <S%H5712>congregation,<s%> what is among them.

<S%H8085>Hear,<s%> <S%H776>earth!<s%> <S%H935>Behold,<s%> I will bring <S%H7451>evil<s%> on this <S%H5971>people,<s%> even the <S%H6529>fruit<s%> of their <S%H4284>thoughts,<s%> because they have not <S%H7181>listened<s%> to my <S%H1697>words;<s%> and as for my <S%H8451>law,<s%> they have rejected <S%H3988>it.<s%>

To what purpose <S%H935>comes<s%> there to me <S%H3828>frankincense<s%> from <S%H7614>Sheba,<s%> and the <S%H2896>sweet<s%> <S%H7070>cane<s%> from a <S%H4801>far<s%> <S%H776>country?<s%> your burnt <S%H5930>offerings<s%> are not <S%H7522>acceptable,<s%> nor your <S%H2077>sacrifices<s%> pleasing to <S%H6149>me.<s%>"

Therefore thus <S%H559>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> <S%H5414>"Behold,<s%> I will lay stumbling <S%H4383>blocks<s%> before this <S%H5971>people.<s%> The <S%H1>fathers<s%> and the <S%H1121>sons<s%> <S%H3162>together<s%> shall <S%H3782>stumble<s%> against <S%H7934>them.<s%> The neighbor and his <S%H7453>friend<s%> shall <S%H6>perish.<s%>"

Thus <S%H559>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> <S%H5971>"Behold,<s%> a people <S%H935>comes<s%> from the <S%H6828>north<s%> <S%H776>country.<s%> A <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H1471>nation<s%> shall be <S%H5782>stirred<s%> up from the uttermost <S%H3411>parts<s%> of the <S%H776>earth.<s%>

They take <S%H2388>hold<s%> of <S%H7198>bow<s%> and <S%H3591>spear.<s%> They are <S%H394>cruel,<s%> and have no <S%H7355>mercy.<s%> Their <S%H6963>voice<s%> <S%H1993>roars<s%> like the <S%H3220>sea,<s%> and they <S%H7392>ride<s%> on <S%H5483>horses,<s%> everyone set in <S%H6186>array,<s%> as a <S%H376>man<s%> to the <S%H4421>battle,<s%> against <S%H1323>you,<s%> daughter of <S%H6726>Zion.<s%>"

We have <S%H8085>heard<s%> its <S%H8089>report;<s%> our <S%H3027>hands<s%> become <S%H7503>feeble:<s%> <S%H6869>anguish<s%> has taken <S%H2388>hold<s%> of <S%H2427>us,<s%> and pains as of a woman in <S%H3205>labor.<s%>

<S%H3318>Don't<s%> go forth into the <S%H7704>field,<s%> nor <S%H3212>walk<s%> by the <S%H1870>way;<s%> for the <S%H2719>sword<s%> of the <S%H341>enemy<s%> and <S%H4032>terror,<s%> are on every <S%H5439>side.<s%>

<S%H1323>Daughter<s%> of my <S%H5971>people,<s%> <S%H2296>clothe<s%> yourself with <S%H8242>sackcloth,<s%> and <S%H6428>wallow<s%> in <S%H665>ashes!<s%> <S%H60>Mourn,<s%> as <S%H6213>for<s%> an only <S%H3173>son,<s%> most <S%H8563>bitter<s%> <S%H4553>lamentation;<s%> for the <S%H7703>destroyer<s%> shall <S%H6597>suddenly<s%> come on <S%H935>us.<s%>
"I have <S%H5414>made<s%> you a <S%H969>tester<s%> of metals and a <S%H4013>fortress<s%> among my <S%H5971>people;<s%> that you may <S%H3045>know<s%> and <S%H974>try<s%> their <S%H1870>way.<s%>

They are all <S%H5493>grievous<s%> <S%H5637>rebels,<s%> <S%H1980>going<s%> about with <S%H7400>slanders;<s%> they are <S%H5178>brass<s%> and <S%H1270>iron:<s%> they all of them deal <S%H7843>corruptly.<s%>

The <S%H4647>bellows<s%> blow <S%H2787>fiercely;<s%> the <S%H5777>lead<s%> is <S%H8552>consumed<s%> of the <S%H800>fire:<s%> in <S%H7723>vain<s%> do they <S%H6884>go<s%> on <S%H6884>refining;<s%> for the <S%H7451>wicked<s%> are not plucked <S%H5423>away.<s%>
Men will <S%H7121>call<s%> them <S%H3988>rejected<s%> <S%H3701>silver,<s%> because <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> has rejected <S%H3988>them.<s%>"
